definition: Dêgê county (Tibetan: sde dge rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
virtue/goodness/morality/ethics/kindness/favor/character/kind
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
Dêgê county (Tibetan: sde dge rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
Martin Heidegger (1889-1976), German philosopher
Van de Graaff (name)/Robert J. Van de Graaff (1901-1967), American physicist
Van de Graaff generator
pinyin: Fan4 de2 ge2 la1 fu1 qi3 dian4 ji1

sentences.english: Heidegger revealed the necessity for explicitly restating the question of Being.
sentences.chinese: 海德格的詮釋現象學揭露了重提存有問題的必要性。

sentences.english: Nonetheless he recognizes how far Heidegger’s ideas have spilled into the larger culture.
sentences.chinese: 不過他承認海德格爾思想已經波及到更大的文化。

sentences.english: Heidegger defines death as an impossible possibility while Levinas it a "a possible impossibility".
sentences.chinese: 海德格爾將死亡定義爲一種不可能的可能性。

sentences.english: Both Husserl and Heidegger have diagnosed the crisis of the contemporary.
sentences.chinese: 對於當代的危機，胡塞爾與海德格爾都曾做出過診斷。

sentences.english: The majority of callers asked for him to be removed.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的人現在要求解僱霍德格森。

sentences.english: This discussion also shows Satre's training in the phenomenology of Husserl and Heidegger.
sentences.chinese: 這次討論還表明薩特訓練胡塞爾與海德格爾的現象。

sentences.english: Heidegger said that people should live poetically in nature.
sentences.chinese: 海德格爾說過，人應該詩意地棲居在自然中。

sentences.english: The second chapter examines the art thought of Heidegger.
sentences.chinese: 第二章疏理了海德格爾的藝術之思。

sentences.english: Van de graaff generators are the current work horses of nuclear structure research .
sentences.chinese: 範德格喇夫加速器是研究原子結構的通用工具。

sentences.english: Heidegger has proposed that human experience in its original form is hermeneutically meaningful.
sentences.chinese: 海德格爾提出起初形式的人類存在是有解釋性意義的。

sentences.english: "Ereignis" is the key word of Heidegger's later philosophic thinking.
sentences.chinese: “生成”是海德格爾後期哲學思想的主導詞語。

sentences.english: And then Heidegger says, you know what?
sentences.chinese: 然後海德格爾說，你知道嗎？

sentences.english: Passions about Heidegger have simmered for years.
sentences.chinese: 海德格爾的這種激情持續了很久。

sentences.english: Heidegger, , Buddhism, East-West-Culture, Tradition and Moderni.
sentences.chinese: 海德格爾，佛教思想，東西方文化，傳統與現代代。

sentences.english: Roy Hodgson becomes the new manager of Liverpool following the departure of Rafael Benitez.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦解僱了瘟胖，霍德格森成爲新教練。

sentences.english: We should look on human life existence as another noumenon, which is enlightened to us by Heidegger's aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 海德格爾美學啓示我們應以人的生活存在爲本體。

to display/to spread out/to distribute/old spelling of 盧布|卢布[lu2 bu4], ruble
